data.title: Scholarship Workshops
data.text:
How to Attend a Scholarship Workshop

New to the scholarship process at PCC? Attend our virtual workshops and learn all the tips and tricks you need to submit a quality scholarship application that will make you competitive for awards this fall.

The Scholarship Workshop Calendar is located HERE. Additional workshops may be added as needed. All workshops will be recorded and posted on the Foundation YouTube Channel. You MUST pre-register for workshops before attending on the Calendly page!!

Can't make any of the scheduled workshops? No problem! We will post recordings of the workshops as they occur on our YouTube Page- the information is current and just as helpful as a "live" workshop (or just scroll down to a workshop video from Fall 2023).

Have specific follow-up needs? CLICK HERE to schedule a Virtual One-on-One Appointment with a Foundation Staff Member. Please note that your one-on-one appointment will be more helpful if you attend or watch a Scholarship Workshop first.

During workshops you will learn:

How to access the application in Blackbaud Award Management

Scholarship Timeline

Information on the Evaluation Process

How Your Financial Aid is Impacted

How to write a strong personal statement and ask for references

This General Workshop Video Can Help!

If you can't attend one of our workshops, you can still get the information you to prepare to apply. Watch our scholarship video to learn more about the application process!
